title: We Make a Snowman
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 54 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 110L
description: We Make a Snowman is a story about three children who go outside together on a snowy day. The friends play in the snow and make a snowman. At the end of the book they go inside the house and eat soup. The repetitive text pattern in this book is supported by delightful illustrations.
